title: Kylie Jenner flashes derrière for Playboy shoot with Travis Scott
text:
Kylie Jenner is posing for Playboy.

The Kylie Cosmetics mogul took to Instagram on Tuesday morning to share a sneak peek at her upcoming spread for the publication, which she teased as "coming soon."

In the sneak peek photo, Jenner is completely nude other than a cowboy hat as she embraces her boyfriend, rapper Travis Scott, who is shirtless and wearing a pair of faded jeans. Her bare derrière is on full display in the picture, which was shot outside in front of a tree.

See the photo in the gallery below:



"When Houston meets LA..." she captioned the post, alluding to their respective hometowns. She also tagged Playboy and used the hashtag #ComingSoon.

Sister Khloe Kardashian couldn't handle the snap, writing in multiple comments, "Wow ok wow good morning!"

Over on Playboy's account, the publication was teasing the photo shoot starring Kylie and Travis with several zoomed in photos that, when looked at next to one another on the account's grid, start to form a photo from the shoot.

Creidt: Playboy/Instagram

Playboy revealed that the Kylie will be on the cover of its upcoming Pleasure Issue. Travis creative directed the photo shoot, which was shot by her longtime photographer friend, Sasha Samsanova.

Kylie's Playboy shoot comes 12 years after older sister, Kim, famously posed nude for the magazine in 2007. In a scene from "Keeping Up With the Kardashians" chronicling the photo shoot, their mother, Kris Jenner, famously took photos with her digital camera while uttering the iconic line, "Kim, you're doing amazing, sweetie!"

Kylie Jenner and Travis Scott have been together for just over two years now and share daughter, Stormi Webster, 1. Recently, Stormi made her red carpet debut alongside her influential parents at the premiere of Scott's Netflix documentary, "Travis Scott: Look Mom I Can Fly."

See photos of the family of three below:
description: Kylie Jenner and Travis Scott posed for the upcoming issue of Playboy, and Kylie teased their photo shoot on Instagram.
